data.system_settings: iPhone XS Max, iOS 12.1.1 Dev Beta 3
data.actual_result: Button only goes transparent when you stop pressing it
data.expected_result: Button goes transparent when you first press it
data.short_description: New invite players button does not become transparent until you release it
data.steps_to_repro: - Tap and hold the new invite players button at the top of a channel - Observe how it does not go transparent - Release your finger - Observe how it goes transparent when you release your finger
